definitions.definition: To hurt the feelings of; to displease; to make angry; to insult.
To feel or become offended; to take insult.
definitions.example: Don't worry. I don't offend easily.

definitions.definition: To annoy, cause discomfort or resent.
definitions.example: Physically enjoyable frivolity can still offend the conscience

definitions.definition: To sin, transgress divine law or moral rules.
To transgress or violate a law or moral requirement.
To cause to stumble; to cause to sin or to fall.
